message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to make a fair offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit high for you. However, I still think the product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering what I've seen so far.

I understand that $135 was still a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $110. I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $125. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal considering the value the product provides.
I appreciate your concession, but $125 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering my budget and what I'm looking for.

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession and offer it to you for $122. This is my best offer, and I think it's a great compromise considering the value the product provides.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $122 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $112 for the product. I think that's a fair price, considering my budget and what I'm looking for.

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $118. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great deal considering the value the product provides.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $118 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
